org.tandembrowsing.state

Class StateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tandembrowsing.state.StateMachine

  • public class StateMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    StateMachine manages the display state based on the interaction events it gets. The StateMachine is responsible of the valid state transitions and that the display is always in a valid state.
    Author:
    tjh
